certifications.title: Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter tuning, Regularization and Optimization

projects: [{"title":"Forecasting of Electrical Meter Readings of buildings in Delhi NCR","start_date":"Feb 2020","end_date":"Feb 2020","description":"• Solution included an ensemble of time series approach and a supervised learning approach.• Analyzed data to map trends and seasonality for peak hours, festivals, seasons with useful graphs and plots.• Time series models used included ARIMA, CNN-LSTM, Vector Auto-Regression (VAR) and FB Prophet.• For the supervised learning approach, feature extraction was done considering factors like holidays, business hours, time ofday, season, etc, and the models deployed included Regression models, Random forest, Light GBM, XGBoost, etc."},{"title":"Prediction of Customer Lifetime Value for customers of an Auto Insurance Company","start_date":"Sep 2019","end_date":"Sep 2019","description":"• Aim was to predict the Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) for different customers for an Auto Insurance Company and also to identify the types of customers who would generally give them high revenue.• Worked on identifying the types of customers profitable for the company by plotting graphs.• Feature Engineered and Hyper-Parameter tuned a Random Forest model achieving MAPE value 9.67%.."}]

honors_and_awards.title: Inter IIT Sports and Games Gold Medalist
honors_and_awards.description: Part of the Gold Winning team of Football in Inter IIT Sports and Games 2019 organized by Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur and Indian Institute of Technology, Bhubaneswar in December 2019.

honors_and_awards.title: Best Athlete
honors_and_awards.description: Awarded the Best Athlete award out of all the participating schools in the North and North-East Bhavan's Athletics and Cultural Meet, 2017.

honors_and_awards.title: Most Valuable Player(MVP)
honors_and_awards.description: Won the Most Valuable Player(MVP) award in the Inter-School Football Tournament, Goalzz, 2017.
